autoexec.register: wait 2;input /echo === Current Weather: Thunder ===;text set vanaweather fg 153 0 204 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Thunder"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Weather: Ice ===;text set vanaweather fg 51 255 255 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Ice"
wait 2;input /echo === Current Weather: Fire ===;text set vanaweather fg 204 51 0 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Fire"
wait 2;input /echo === Current Weather: Earth ===;text set vanaweather fg 204 153 51 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Earth"

wait 2;input /echo === Current Weather: Water ===;text set vanaweather fg 0 51 204 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Water"
wait 2;input /echo === Current Weather: Light ===;text set vanaweather fg 255 255 255 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Light"
wait 2;input /echo === Current Weather: Dark ===;text set vanaweather fg 105 105 105 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Dark"

wait 2; input /echo === Current Weather: Fog ===;text set vanaweather fg 190 190 190 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Foggy"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Weather: Cloudy ===;text set vanaweather fg 190 190 190 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Cloudy"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Weather: Sunny ===;text set vanaweather fg 255 215 0 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 880 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Sunny"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Fireday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 204 51 0 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Firesday"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Earthsday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 204 153 51 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Earthsday"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Watersday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 0 51 204 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Watersday"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Windsday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 34 139 34 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Windsday"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Iceday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 51 255 255 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Iceday"
wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Lightningday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 153 0 204 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Lightningday"

wait 2; input /echo === Current Day: Darksday ===;wait 1;text set vanaday fg 105 105 105 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 910 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Darksday"
wait 2;input /echo === New Day (04:00-06:00) ===;wait 1;text set vanatime fg 255 215 0 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 940 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "New Day (04:00-06:00)"
wait 2;input /echo === Dawn (06:00-07:00) ===;wait 1;text set vanatime fg 200 255 255 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 940 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Dawn (06:00-07:00)"
wait 2;input /echo === Day (07:00-17:00) ===;wait 1;text set vanatime fg 200 255 255 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 940 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Day (07:00-17:00)"
wait 2;input /echo === Dusk (16:00-18:00) ===;wait 1;text set vanatime fg 190 190 190 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 940 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Dusk (16:00-18:00)"
wait 2;input /echo === Evening (18:00-20:00) ===;wait 1;text set vanatime fg 190 190 190 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 940 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Evening (18:00-20:00)"
wait 2;input /echo === Night (20:00-04:00) ===;wait 1;text set vanatime fg 105 105 105 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 1300 940 font Arial 11 bold 1 text "Night (20:00-04:00)"
wait 2;text set doom fg 204 153 51 255 bg 0 0 0 192 show showbg position 600 250 font Arial 32 bold 1 text "DOOM!"
wait 2;text set doom hide
ll profile default
ll profile Dynamis
ll profile Abyssea
wait 1;input /echo DT TIME!;
